src_original: varṣaśatopasaṃpannayā ānanda bhikṣuṇyā tad ahar upasaṃpannasya bhikṣor abhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalisāmīcīkarma kartavyam ity ayaṃ gautami bha/// @-----------------------------
tgt_original: 比丘尼雖先受戒百歲，故應禮拜起迎新受戒比丘。

src_original: śṛṇu tvam evannāmike ayaṃ te satyakālo yaṃ te bhūtakālaḥ /
tgt_original: 復應語言「汝某甲聽！ 今是實語時。

src_original: yat te 'haṃ kiñ cit pṛcchāmi /  sarvan tat tvayā viśāradayā bhūtvā bhūtañ ca bhūtato vaktavyaṃ abhūtañ cābhūtato nirveṭhayitavyaṃ /  strī tvaṃ strī gṛhoṣitā dvādaśavarṣā kumārikā vā paripūrṇaviṃśativarṣā paripūrṇaṃ te pañcacīvaraṃ pātraṃ ca /
tgt_original: 我今問汝，若有當言有、若無當言無。 汝不殺父耶？ 汝不殺母耶？

src_original: paripūrṇaṃ /  mā tvayā rājāpathyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ vā kāritaṃ vā /  mā caṇḍā mā śokahatā mā gurviṇī mā avyaṃñjanā mā ubhayavyañjanā /
tgt_original: 汝不殺阿羅漢耶？

src_original: mā saṃbhinnavyañjanā mā sadāprasrutalohinī (BhīKaVā 16b1) /  mā alohinī /  mā naimittikī /
tgt_original: 汝不惡心出佛身血耶？ 汝不破和合僧耶？

src_original: mā bhikṣudūṣiṇī /  mā mātṛghātikā /  mā pitṛghātikā /  mārhadghātikā /
tgt_original: 汝不犯淨行比丘耶？ 汝非非人耶？

src_original: mā tathāgatasyāntike duṣṭacittarudhirotpādikā mā tīrthikā mā tīrthikāvakrāntikā /
tgt_original: 汝非畜生耶？ 汝非黃門耶？ 汝非二形耶？ 汝非自剃頭自稱比丘尼耶？

src_original: mā caurī //  mā dhvajabaddhikā /  mā steyasaṃvāsikā /  mā nānāsaṃvāsikā /  mā asaṃvāsikā /  kaccit tvaṃ pūrvaṃ pravrajitā /
tgt_original: 汝非捨內外道耶？ 汝不曾出家持戒不完具耶？

src_original: jvaraḥ kṣayaḥ klamaḥ bhramaḥ śvāsaḥ /  kāśaḥ śoṣo 'pasmāraḥ /  āṭakkaraḥ /  pāṇḍurogaḥ /  ślīpadaḥ /  raktapittaṃ /  bhagandaraḥ aṅgadāhaḥ /  pārśvadāhaḥ /
tgt_original: 癩病、白癩病、乾痟病、癲狂病、癕疽漏病脂出病。

src_original: śṛṇu tvam evannāmike ayaṃ te satyakālo yaṃ bhūtakālaḥ /
tgt_original: 復應語言「汝某甲聽！ 今是實語時。

src_original: yat te 'haṃ kiñ cit pṛcchāmi /  sarvaṃ tat tvayā viśāradayā bhūtvā bhūtaṃ ca bhūtato vaktavyam abhūtañ cābhūtato nirveṭhayitavyaṃ  strī tvaṃ strī gṛhoṣitā dvādaśavarṣā kumārikā vā paripūrṇaviṃśativarṣā /  paripūrṇaviṃśativarṣā /  paripūrṇaṃ te pañcacīvaraṃ pātraṃ ca /  paripūrṇaṃ /
tgt_original: 我今問汝，若有當言有、若無當言無。

src_original: jīvatas te mātāpitarau svāmī vā jīvati /  anujñātāsi mātāpitṛbhyāṃ svāminā vā /  anujñātā /  māsi dāsī /  na hi mā āhṛtikā /  mā vikrītikā /  mā vaktavyikā /
tgt_original: 汝不殺父耶？

src_original: mā nirmitikā /  mā rājabhaṭī /  mā tvayā rājāpathyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ vā kāritaṃ vā mā caṇḍā mā śokahatā mā gurviṇī mā avyañjanā mā ubhayavyañjanā mā saṃbhinnavyañjanā /  mā sadāprasrutalohinī /  mā alohinī /  mā naimittikī /  mā bhikṣudūṣikā /  mā mātṛghātikā /  mā pitṛghātikā (BhīKaVā 20a1) /
tgt_original: 汝不殺母耶？

src_original: mā arhadghātikā /
tgt_original: 汝不殺阿羅漢耶？

src_original: mā tathāgatasyāntike duṣṭacittarudhirotpādikā mā tīrthikā mā tīrthāvakrāntikā mā caurī mā dhvajabaddhikā mā steyasaṃvāsikā mā nānāsaṃvāsikā mā asaṃvāsikā /
tgt_original: 汝不惡心出佛身血耶？

src_original: nādhyāpatsye /  śṛṇu tvam evannāmike aṣṭāv ime tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenaivaṃ  pravrajitopasaṃpannāyā bhikṣuṇyā gurudharmāḥ prajñaptā āvaraṇayānatikramaṇāya yatra  mātṛgrāmeṇa yāvajjīvaṃ śikṣā karaṇīyā /
tgt_original: 「汝某甲聽！

src_original: katame aṣṭau  bhikṣubhyaḥ sakāśād evaṃnāmike mātṛgrāmeṇa pravrajyā upasaṃpad bhikṣuṇībhāvaḥ pratikāṃkṣitavya (BhīKaVā 30a1)  ayam evannāmike bhagavatā mātṛgrāmasya prathamo gurudharmaḥ prajñaptaḥ /
tgt_original: 如來、應供、等正覺說是八不可越法。

src_original: āvaraṇāyānatikramaṇāya yatra mātṛgrāmeṇa yāvajjīvaṃ śikṣā karaṇīyā /
tgt_original: 汝盡形壽不應越。

src_original: bhikṣubhyaḥ sakāśād bhikṣuṇyā anvardhamāsam avavādānuśāsanī paryeṣitavyā /
tgt_original: 比丘尼半月應從比丘眾乞教誡人。

src_original: ayam evannāmike bhagavatā mātṛgrāmasya dvitīyo gurudharmaḥ prajñapta āvaraṇāyānatikramaṇāya yatra mātṛgrāmeṇa yāvajjīvaṃ śikṣā karaṇīyā /  na bhikṣuṇyā abhikṣuke āvāse varṣā upagantavyā ayam evaṃnāmike bhagavatā mātṛgrāmasya tṛtīyo gurudharmaḥ prajñaptaḥ /  āvaraṇāyānatikramaṇāya yatra mātṛgrāmeṇa yāvajjīvaṃ śikṣā karaṇīyā /
tgt_original: 比丘尼不於無比丘處夏安居。

src_original: varṣoṣitayā bhikṣuṇyā ubhayasaṃghas tribhiḥ sthānaiḥ pravārayitavyaḥ /  dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā /
tgt_original: 比丘尼自恣時應從比丘眾請三事見聞疑罪。

src_original: na bhikṣuṇyā bhikṣuś codayitavyaḥ (BhīKaVā 30b1)
tgt_original: 比丘尼不得罵比丘。

src_original: āvṛtaṃ bhikṣuṇyā bhikṣuñ codayituṃ smārayituṃ śīlavipattyā dṛṣṭivipattyā ājīvavipattyā /  anāvṛtaṃ bhikṣor bhikṣuṇīṃ codayituṃ smārayituṃ śīlavipattyā dṛṣṭivipattyā ājīvavipattyā  ayam evannāmike bhagavatā mātṛgrāmasya pañcamo gurudharmaḥ prajñapta āvaraṇāyānatikramaṇāya  yatra mātṛgrāmeṇa yāvajjīvaṃ śikṣā karaṇīyā /
tgt_original: 不得於白衣家說比丘破戒破威儀破見。

src_original: na bhikṣuṇyā bhikṣur ākroṣṭavyo na roṣayitavya āvṛtam bhikṣuṇyā bhikṣum ākroṣṭuṃ
tgt_original: 比丘尼不應舉比丘罪，比丘得呵。

src_original: roṣayituṃ paribhāṣayitum ayam evaṃnāmike bhagavatā mātṛgrāmasya ṣaṣṭo gurudharmaḥ  prajñapta āvaraṇāyānatikramaṇāya yatra mātṛgrāmeṇa yāvajjīvaṃ śikṣā karaṇīyā /  gurudharmādhyāpannayā bhikṣuṇyā ubhayasaṃghe anvardhamāsaṃ mānāpyañ caritavyam ayam  evannāmike bhagavatā mātṛgrāmasya saptamo gurudharmaḥ prajñapta āvaraṇāyānatikramaṇāya  yatra mātṛgrāmeṇa (BhīKaVā 31a1)
tgt_original: 比丘尼犯麁惡，應在二部僧中半月行摩那埵； 半月行摩那埵已，應各二十僧中求出罪。

src_original: varṣaśatopasaṃpannayā bhikṣuṇyā tad ahar upasaṃpannasya bhikṣor abhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalisāmīcīkarma
tgt_original: 比丘尼雖先受戒百歲，故應禮拜起迎新受戒比丘。

src_original: varṣoṣitayā ānanda bhikṣuṇyā ubhayasaṃghas tribhiḥ sthānaiḥ pravārayitavyaḥ /  dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayety ayaṃ gautami bhagavatā mātṛgrāmasya caturtho gurudharmaḥ prajñapta āvaraṇāyānatikramaṇāya yatra mātṛgrāmeṇa yāvajjīvaṃ śikṣā karaṇīyā /
tgt_original: 比丘尼不於無比丘處夏安居。 比丘尼自恣時應從比丘眾請三事見聞疑罪。 式叉摩那學二歲戒已，應在二部僧中受具足戒。

src_original: bhagavān gautamy evam āha /  na bhikṣuṇyā ānanda bhikṣuś codayitavyaḥ smārayitavyaḥ śīlavipattyā dṛṣṭivipattyā ācāravipattyā ājīvavipattyā /
tgt_original: 比丘尼不得罵比丘。

src_original: āvṛtam ānanda bhikṣuṇyā bhikṣuṃ codayituṃ smārayituṃ śīlavipattyā dṛṣṭivipattyā ācāravipattyā  ājīvavipattyā anāvṛtam bhikṣor bhikṣuṇīṃ codayituṃ smārayituṃ śīlavipattyā dṛṣṭivipattyā  ācāravipattyā ājīvavipattyā ity ayaṃ gautami bhagavatā mātṛgrāmasya pañcamo gurudharmaḥ (BhīKaVā 7b1)  prajñapta āvaraṇāyānatikramaṇāya yatra mātṛgrāmeṇa yāvajjīvaṃ śikṣā karaṇīyā /  bhagavān gautamy evam āha /
tgt_original: 不得於白衣家說比丘破戒破威儀破見。

src_original: na bhikṣuṇyā ānanda bhikṣur ākroṣṭavyo na roṣayitavyo na paribhāṣayitavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 比丘尼不應舉比丘罪，比丘得呵。

src_original: bhagavān gautamy evam āha /  gurudharmādhyāpannayā ānanda bhikṣuṇyā ubhayasaṃghe anvardhamāsaṃ mānāpyaṃ caritavyam  ity ayaṃ gautami bhagavatā mātṛgrāmasya saptamo gurudharmaḥ prajñapta āvaraṇāyānatikramaṇāya  yatra mātṛgrāmeṇa yāvajjīvaṃ śikṣā karaṇīyā /  bhagavān gautamy evam āha /
tgt_original: 半月行摩那埵已，應各二十僧中求出罪。
